Bash(PGPASSWORD="Iasaninja1973.." psql -h aws-1-eu-north-1.pooler.supabase.com -p 6543 -U postgres.oijmohlhdxoawzvctnxx -d postgres -c "
SELECT 
  table_name,
  column_name,
  data_type,
  column_default,
  is_nullable
FROM information_schema.columns 
WHERE table_name IN (''materials'', ''material_orders'', ''material_allocations'', ''material_transactions'')
ORDER BY table_name, ordinal_position;
")

Bash(PGPASSWORD="Iasaninja1973.." psql -h aws-1-eu-north-1.pooler.supabase.com -p 6543 -U postgres.oijmohlhdxoawzvctnxx -d postgres -c "
-- Check if project_id exists in material_transactions
SELECT column_name 
FROM information_schema.columns 
WHERE table_name = ''material_transactions'' AND column_name = ''project_id'';
")

Bash(PGPASSWORD="Iasaninja1973.." psql -h aws-1-eu-north-1.pooler.supabase.com -p 6543 -U postgres.oijmohlhdxoawzvctnxx -d postgres -c "
-- Show sample materials with current stock
SELECT 
  id,
  name,
  current_stock,
  unit,
  category
FROM materials 
LIMIT 5;
")

Bash(PGPASSWORD="Iasaninja1973.." psql -h aws-1-eu-north-1.pooler.supabase.com -p 6543 -U postgres.oijmohlhdxoawzvctnxx -d postgres -c "
-- Check allocations with calculated remaining
SELECT 
  ma.id,
  m.name as material_name,
  m.current_stock,
  ma.quantity_allocated,
  ma.quantity_used,
  ma.quantity_remaining,
  ma.status,
  p.name as project_name
FROM material_allocations ma
JOIN materials m ON m.id = ma.material_id
LEFT JOIN projects p ON p.id = ma.project_id
ORDER BY ma.created_at DESC
LIMIT 5;
")

Bash(PGPASSWORD="Iasaninja1973.." psql -h aws-1-eu-north-1.pooler.supabase.com -p 6543 -U postgres.oijmohlhdxoawzvctnxx -d postgres -c "
-- Show all materials with clean state
SELECT 
  id,
  name,
  current_stock,
  unit,
  category,
  unit_price_eur
FROM materials 
ORDER BY name;
")

Bash(PGPASSWORD="Iasaninja1973.." psql -h aws-1-eu-north-1.pooler.supabase.com -p 6543 -U postgres.oijmohlhdxoawzvctnxx -d postgres -c "SELECT constraint_name, check_clause FROM information_schema.check_constraints WHERE table_name = ''material_transactions'' AND constraint_name LIKE ''%transaction_type%'';")

Bash(PGPASSWORD="Iasaninja1973.." psql -h aws-1-eu-north-1.pooler.supabase.com -p 6543 -U postgres.oijmohlhdxoawzvctnxx -d postgres -c "
SELECT con.conname, pg_get_constraintdef(con.oid)
FROM pg_constraint con
JOIN pg_class rel ON rel.oid = con.conrelid
WHERE rel.relname = ''material_transactions'' AND con.contype = ''c'';
")

Bash(PGPASSWORD="Iasaninja1973.." psql -h aws-1-eu-north-1.pooler.supabase.com -p 6543 -U postgres.oijmohlhdxoawzvctnxx -d postgres -c "
-- Check current columns in material_allocations
SELECT column_name, data_type, is_nullable
FROM information_schema.columns 
WHERE table_name = ''material_allocations''
ORDER BY ordinal_position;
")

Bash(PGPASSWORD="Iasaninja1973.." psql -h aws-0-eu-north-1.pooler.supabase.com -p 6543 -U postgres.oijmohlhdxoawzvctnxx -d postgres -c "
-- Check project_contacts table
SELECT column_name, data_type, is_nullable, column_default
FROM information_schema.columns 
WHERE table_name = ''project_contacts''
ORDER BY ordinal_position;
")

Bash(PGPASSWORD="Iasaninja1973.." psql -h aws-1-eu-north-1.pooler.supabase.com -p 6543 -U postgres.oijmohlhdxoawzvctnxx -d postgres -c "
SELECT table_name 
FROM information_schema.tables 
WHERE table_schema = ''public'' 
  AND table_name LIKE ''%constraint%'' OR table_name LIKE ''%contact%''
ORDER BY table_name;
")

Bash(PGPASSWORD="Iasaninja1973.." psql -h aws-1-eu-north-1.pooler.supabase.com -p 6543 -U postgres.oijmohlhdxoawzvctnxx -d postgres -c "

")

Bash(PGPASSWORD="Iasaninja1973.." psql -h aws-1-eu-north-1.pooler.supabase.com -p 6543 -U postgres.oijmohlhdxoawzvctnxx -d postgres -c "
